attributes.additional_details:
Due to the sad and sudden passing of one of Britain's greatest comedians Rik Mayall who changed the history of comedy as we know it today, I think to show respect to him, his family and his 30 years involvement in comedy that changed our lives whether you know it or not to have a day dedicated to him to celebrate his birth and life as a tribute.

This day will be the 7th of March
He must never be forgotten for his achievements.
